examples: He left a note to say he would be home late.

definitions.definition: a short explanation or an extra piece of information that is given at the bottom of a page, at the back of a book, etc.:

examples: The wind blew my notes all over the room.
They noted the consumers' growing demand for quicker service.

definitions.definition: to give your attention to something by discussing it or making a written record of it:
examples: [ + that ] He said the weather was beyond our control, noting that last summer was one of the hottest on record.
